member.name: T:TasksLibDay2.Tasks
member.summary: Main static class for Day2's tasks solutions Consist of two algorithms (#1 and #6 tasks)

members.member: Filter of an int array by existion of choosen digit Initial array of numbers Digit, that initial array's numbers must contain Array of filtered numbers Thrown when null comes as an array Thrown when we get an empty array Thrown when the sencond parametr is not a digit (must be 0..9)
